fees.description:
Disconnection - On site. This fee is passed through from your distributor and may vary. Please visit your distributor's website to find out the current fee.
We reserve the right to and will notify you if we change or impose additional fees or charges in relation to your energy supply. Fees and charges charged by the distributor are published on your distributorâ€™s website and may change from time to time.
Disconnection - Remote. This fee is passed through from your distributor and may vary. Please visit your distributor's website to find out the current fee.

electricityContract.terms: Eligibility criteria apply, for terms and conditions see alintaenergy.com.au/termsandconditions or call 13 39 08.
electricityContract.variation: Alinta Energy's market tariff and feed in tariffs (where applicable) may be varied in accordance with applicable laws. If we change the applicable tariff, we will give you notice of any variations in accordance with applicable laws.

incentives.eligibility: New or moving customers who sign-up online only. Bonus credit applied on 1st bill provided you're still on this Energy Plan at that time. Credits can't be transferred/exchanged or paid out. Bonus credits limited to 1 per account in any 12-month period.

eligibility.information: This Energy Plan is only available to customers with an applicable network tariff.

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: This offer has no contract term.
